com.ac.games.db.mongo

Class StatsConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ac.games.db.mongo.StatsConverter

  • public class StatsConverter
extends Object
    Author:
    ac010168 Unlike many of the other Converter classes, this one will process all the basic stats objects, with the assumption that all values in the stats blocks are not optional. This is also operating under the assumption that we never update stats. We will always be performing delete/reinsert with this data. The other assumption is that only one row will exist per statType, with the statType values being defined as static constants in the corresponding data class.

        Helper method that will construct a basic query using the gameID from the provided game.
        Parameters:
        game - The Game we want to build a query for.
        Returns:
        Returns a BasicDBObject object that represents this query, or null if no game was provided
